sentence.Network_en: The doctor worked busily beneath the blinding lights of the delivery room.
sentence.Network_cn: 这位医生在产房刺目的灯光下忙碌着。

sentence.Network_en: The two saleswomen were busily trying to keep up with the demand.
sentence.Network_cn: 那两名女售货员正忙着接待顾客。

sentence.Network_en: A wind-up clock ticked busily from the kitchen counter.
sentence.Network_cn: 一只上了弦的钟在厨房的案子上嘀嗒响个不停。

PerfectNetExp.abs: busiest 最忙的busily 忙碌地business address 营业处
he was busily employed in cleaning his shoes ., 他正忙着擦鞋呢.
To move or cause to move energetically and busily ., 奔忙 , 使忙碌使或引起积极地且繁忙地运动.
he abandons his easy walk and moves his legs forward busily .他放弃了从容的步法，两条腿急促地向前迈进。

list.abs: ZOE In sudden blunt wait knowledge busily alarm ., 在突然的钝等候知识中忙碌地惊慌.
The woman busily collected the ripened reddish berries ., 那妇女忙着采集成熟的淡红色的莓果.
She was busily preparing for the finals ., 她正在忙于准备期终考试.
The woman busily collected the ripened reddish berries ., 那妇女忙着采集成熟的淡红色的莓果.

entry.def: If you do something busily, you do it in a very active way.

example.ex: The two saleswomen were busily trying to keep up with the demand.
example.tran: 那两名女售货员正忙着接待顾客。

sentences.sentence: "they were busily engaged in buying souvenirs"

auth_sentence.content: Tweeny is...very busily plucking the feathers off a bird.
auth_sentence.res_content: Tweeny is...very busily plucking the feathers off a bird.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Tweeny is...very busily plucking the feathers off a bird.

auth_sentence.content: Vice's trendy young employees milled busily about.
auth_sentence.res_content: Vice's trendy young employees milled busily about.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Vice's trendy young employees milled busily about.

auth_sentence.content: It was never very edifying anyway, each camp busily caricaturing the other.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was never very edifying anyway, each camp busily caricaturing the other.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was never very edifying anyway, each camp busily caricaturing the other.

sentences.en: A swarm of ants are moving busily.
sentences.cn: 一群蚂蚁正在忙碌地搬家。

sentences.en: All were busily engaged,men at their ploughs,women at their looms.
sentences.cn: 大家都很忙,男的耕田,女的织布。
母亲正在忙着切三明治。
